comments_on_usage_csv.0: this is to document the JSON
comments_on_usage_csv.1: mandatory: system section: generic parameters about file and process
comments_on_usage_csv.2: header is for first summary row. For structure- refer below
comments_on_usage_csv.3: detail is for the multiple detail rows 1 per subscriber record
comments_on_usage_csv.3.2a: src_type is code - needs C# to generate snippet, column- from data_table
comments_on_usage_csv.3.2b: --sqlfuntion-same as column but actually a pgsql func, param- program parameter index 0 rel
comments_on_usage_csv.3.2c: --srctype starting with # is comment - to be ignored, like TEST Mode or deprecated but kept for historical reasons
comments_on_usage_csv.3.3: db_value is database column name or function name or named c# snippet
comments_on_usage_csv.limitation: detail_id as detail row Id is a must with that alias, must be selected
